The Mamuniyeh Cu deposit, with a mining area of approximately 57 km2, is located in the central part of Urumieh-Dokhtar Magmatic Arc. The main lithological units are Eocene pyroclastic to effusive volcanic sequences with acidic to alkaline compositions...

properties.description:
Atash-Anbar Au deposit, Takestan County, Qazvin Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

properties.description:
Takab BIF, Takab County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Location: Iran

properties.description:
Band-e-Cherk ferromanganese occurrence, Ardestan County, Isfahan Province, Iran

Type: 281

Location: Iran
